title: Handle Inbound Freight Scheduling
description: A large shipment is due to arrive from a supplier. A warehouse manager must schedule a delivery appointment.

tasks.description: Receive a notification from the freight carrier that the shipment is ready for final delivery.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the alert from the carrier.

tasks.description: Check the warehouse's receiving dock schedule for availability.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds an open time slot for tomorrow morning.

tasks.description: Book the delivery appointment with the carrier.
